title: Zojirushi Fresh Brew Plus Thermal Carafe Coffee Maker EC-YSC100
description: Brewing flavorful coffee is easy with our new Fresh Brew Plus Thermal Carafe Coffee Maker ES-YSC100. It makes up to 10 cups of freshly brewed coffee and is brewed at the optimal temperature for flavor extraction. It will keep coffee above 158 degrees F for up to two hours in our vacuum insulated thermal carafe, which means no burnt coffee taste for your coffee refills! All surfaces that come into contact with food are BPA free and it even has a cleaning alert light to advise you when cleaning is recommended.

asset.author: ZojirushiAmerica
asset.description: Brewing flavorful coffee is easy with our new Fresh Brew Plus Thermal Carafe Coffee Maker ES-YSC100. It makes up to 10 cups of freshly brewed coffee and is brewed at the optimal temperature for flavor extraction. It will keep coffee above 158 degrees F for up to two hours in our vacuum insulated thermal carafe, which means no burnt coffee taste for your coffee refills! All surfaces that come into contact with food are BPA free and it even has a cleaning alert light to advise you when cleaning is recommended.

transcripts: Brew delicious flavorful coffee in the comfort of your own home in just minutes with Zojirushi  new fresh brew plus thermal carafe coffee maker. The fresh brew plus uses Zojirushi superior vacuum insulation technology to keep coffee hot for hours in this carafe and because it uses vacuum insulation and not a hotplate coffee will never burn. The carafe has a nicely tapered design with a thumb activated lid to make pouring and serving smooth and simple. It's made of durable stainless steel and all surfaces that come in contact with coffee are BPA-free. This model has a 10 cup capacity and the removable water tank makes filling easy, simply fill your desired amount of water into the clearly marked tank and put ground coffee into the filter basket accordingly then press the on button. The fresh brew plus brews coffee at 200 degrees Fahrenheit which is the optimal temperature for the best tasting coffee with the 24 hour programmable timer and clock fresh hot coffee can be ready in the morning. When brewing completes and the carafe is removed the basket spring-loaded mechanism is designed to prevent drips. The fresh brew plus is easy to clean and the water tank is fully washable and the swing and filter basket slipped out easily for thorough cleaning. In addition this unit has a clean light indicator that illuminates when cleaning is recommended. Zojirushi inspirations from everyday life.
